name: Outdoor Research Vigor Lightweight Sensor Gloves - Men's
description: Ultralight and thermo-regulating, the Vigor gloves offer light protection for your fingers when you're working hard. The wicking fleece prevents clammy palms, and conductive finger tips let you check your location without losing warmth.ActiveTemp fleece regulates temperature to keep hands warm without overheating.Anti-slip silicone print on palm.Synthetic suede thumb and index tip are touch-screen compatible.
